nodes.text: Bellon was a Devaronian chef serving at Jamie Brasen's estate during the High Republic Era. He had a fiery temper, and committed over ten murders in the Begamore underworld. However, due to his proficiency at meat cookery, the red-skinned Devaronian was sheltered by the President Jamie Brasen of Begamore and given the responsibility of preparing meat at Brasen's estate.
